articles.title: Putting premium berries in the spotlight — Naturipe expects higher volumes across all categories in 2026
articles.summary: Naturipe Farms is putting premium berries at the forefront at the Southeast Produce Council Southern Exposure conference. Across strawberries, blueberries, raspberries, and blackberries, the company expects increased volumes in 2026. Investments in improved varieties and expanded acreage are translating into strong, promotable supplies when demand is highest.

articles.title: Florida strawberry levels increasing after freeze recovery
articles.summary: Florida strawberry supply is recovering after being down 50% for two weeks due to a freeze. With warmer weather returning, production is expected to pick up sharply. Growers are confident of covering Valentine's Day commitments. Supply transitions from Chile and Peru blueberries to Florida from early March.

articles.title: Extreme weather in Huelva: 'I haven't seen conditions this extreme in more than 30 years'
articles.summary: Severe rain and wind in February 2026 are causing major damage to Huelva strawberry and raspberry plots. Limited availability is keeping prices high but fruit quality is impacted. Northern Morocco is also flooded, reducing competing supply to European markets and tightening overall berry availability.

articles.title: Spain's berry production down 3.4% — strawberry and raspberry supply falls, blueberry up 5.5%
articles.summary: Spain's berry sector contracted 3.4% to 371,713 tons due to reduced strawberry and raspberry acreage driven by irrigation water uncertainty. Blueberry production bucked the trend with a 5.5% increase. Only Cuna de Platero, Algaida, and Berryworld Iberia reported volume increases among the Top 15 producers.

articles.title: Egyptian strawberry acreage increased, but yield per hectare declined
articles.summary: From January 2026, Egyptian strawberries face tighter EU border controls with 20% of shipments physically inspected for pesticide residues. Frozen strawberry volumes are approaching sold-out levels early in the season. Key export destinations for Egyptian strawberries include Germany, Poland and the Netherlands.

articles.title: Surging demand and higher prices fuel organic strawberry expansion
articles.summary: Organic strawberry nursery sales have increased year-over-year since 2020, with prices rising 3-5% annually. Wellness trends are driving demand for pesticide-free berries. California is increasing strawberry acreage by 5% for 2026 with a transition to newer high-yield varieties that began in 2024.

articles.title: New probiotic blueberry product — California Giant Berry Farms debuts Belli Berries at SEPC
articles.summary: California Giant Berry Farms is showcasing Belli Berries at the Southeast Produce Council Southern Exposure event — fresh blueberries boosted with live probiotic cultures. The product is dairy-free, plant-based, vegan-friendly and non-GMO. The full lineup also includes jumbo blueberries, and organic strawberries, raspberries and blackberries.
